name: Synthetic Dreams
description:
I'd prefer it if you did not purchase this.

My intention is to continue iterating. This is not early access.
If I died tomorrow: My synthetic dreams would be complete.

You insist, there are things you must learn.
The history of me. The history of Synthetic Dreams.
An ancient tumblr. Some monthly updates.

The price of admission is your admittance of trust.
My intention is to continue iterating.
